title: Liebeswahn

title: Limits of Control – Der geheimnisvolle Killer
notes: 2009 Jim Jarmusch minimalist existential thriller with Isaach De Bankolé - distinctive contemplative style

notes: 1998 Mark Herman film with Jane Horrocks, Michael Caine about shy girl who channels dead singers - based on play
